        @RequestMapping(value="/{productId}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Comment getComment(@PathVariable(value="productId")
                                                                                                           java.lang.Long productId,
                                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Parameters:
        productId - The product Id obtained from AJAX request

      • saveComment

        @RequestMapping(value="/{commentId}",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public Post saveComment(@PathVariable(value="commentId")
                                                                                                          java.lang.Long commentId,
                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                          Post post,
                                                                                                          org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Parameters:
        commentId - The id of the comment that the post is to be inserted
        post - The message in the comment
        bindingResult - The result from binder about success or failure
        model - The model that is going to be passed to CommentService
        Returns:
        The post message encoded as JSON
